name: Drive Me, Crazy
description:
Drive Me, Crazy is a slice-of-life game that follows a lonely trucker and focuses on a very common issue within the LGBT community. There is a phenomenon where many of us feel like potential partners are so few and far between that once we do find someone like us, we jump the gun and feel like we can't lose them in fear of never finding someone for us again. It's all or nothing.  

The goal of this game is to showcase that mindset from the perspective of a gay trucker.
